title: Add founder name and phone number to Contact section and footer

requirements.text: Update the Contact section content to display the founder name "RAJU SARKAR" with title "Founder", and replace the placeholder phone number with "+91 8135954933". Ensure all user-facing text remains in English and that the phone number is presented clearly (preferably as a clickable tel: link).

quotes:
Name RAJU SARKAR FOUNDER 
CONTACT NO +91 8135954933

acceptanceCriteria: On the Contact section (frontend/src/components/sections/ContactSection.tsx), the displayed phone number is "+91 8135954933" (no placeholder remains).
The Contact section includes founder identification: "RAJU SARKAR" and "Founder".
The phone number in the Contact section is clickable (tel:+918135954933) and visually consistent with the existing contact info UI.

requirements.text: Update the site footer contact details to replace the placeholder phone number with "+91 8135954933" and include founder identification "RAJU SARKAR" with title "Founder" in the footer’s contact/company info area. Ensure all user-facing text remains in English.

quotes:

acceptanceCriteria: In the footer (frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx), the displayed phone number is "+91 8135954933" (no placeholder remains).
The footer includes founder identification: "RAJU SARKAR" and "Founder" in a sensible location within the footer content.

requirements.text: Update the contact form phone field placeholder text to reflect the provided phone format (use "+91 8135954933" as the example), while keeping validation behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx, the phone input placeholder is updated to a realistic example based on "+91 8135954933".
Client-side validation and success/error UI behavior remains unchanged.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Implementing backend form submission or storing contact inquiries in the Motoko backend.
Adding or changing email address details (no email was provided by the user).
Changing the site’s overall layout or theme beyond inserting the requested founder/phone details.
